question: Which of the following writers composed Tabaquat-i-Akbari Tarikh Alfi?
explanation: Khwaja Nizamuddin Ahmad Harami was a Muslim historian of late medieval India. He was the Mir Bakhshi during the reign of Akbar. Khwaja Nizamuddin Ahmad Harami was also the writer of Tabaquat-i-Akbari Tarikh Alfi.
